backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining products, categories, orders, user profiles, and admin‑restricted catalog/order operations with access‑control mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router setup with all public and admin routes wrapped in AppLayout and CartProvider.
Restricts admin routes by checking identity, admin status, and profile completion before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing header, navigation, mobile menu, cart badge, and footer around page content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that triggers Internet Identity login/logout and updates query cache accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting admins to enter their name and save a new user profile.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Badge component that displays payment status using styled variants for pending, paid, or failed.
frontend/src/components/PaymentMethodSel: UI component for selecting cash-on-delivery or UPI payment and capturing UPI reference input.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays product info with image, price, stock badge, and navigation to product details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context for authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for categories, products, orders, and user profiles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Admin interface for managing categories and products, including creation, editing, and seeding demo data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows admin overview with product and order counts plus navigation to catalog and order management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin page listing all orders, showing details, and allowing payment status updates.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and navigation to products or checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays product categories with loading skeletons and navigation to category product lists.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout form, validation, payment selection, and order placement before redirecting to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays hero section, feature highlights, and a featured products list on the store homepage.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows confirmation details for a placed order and provides options to track the order or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays product details, handles quantity selection, and adds items to the cart with loading and missing-product states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists all products or category-filtered products with loading states and category navigation.
frontend/src/pages/TrackOrderPage.tsx: Allows users to enter an order ID and phone number to fetch and display order status and details.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.tsx: Provides a React context for cart state with add, remove, update, clear, and total-price functions, persisting items in localStorage with BigInt handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL params (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and manage persisted parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration customizing colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the project's UI theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, features, versions, and image needs for the Jubaan Hit Masala storefront app.
